original_text: Moreover the altar that was at Bethel, and the high place which Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who made Israel to sin, had made, both that altar and the high place he brake down, and burned the high place, and stamped it small to powder, and burned the grove.
korean_text: 또한 이스라엘에게 범죄하게 한 느밧의 아들 여로보암이 벧엘에 세운 제단과 산당들을 왕이 헐고 또 그 산당을 불사르고 빻아서 가루를 만들며 또 아세라 목상을 불살랐더라

sentences.original_text: Moreover the altar that was at Bethel,
and the high place which Jeroboam son of Nebat,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 느밧의 아들 여로보암이 만든 산당은

sentences.original_text: both that altar and the high place he brake down,
and stamped it small to powder,
